fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assault!: Hit a target with a Powerful Attack. If they target has any form of defense, or your kill fails, your next use of Assault! Will be a Basic Attack. 2 uses. +2 uses and resets to Powerful when the Marshal reveals themselves.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you kill a member of the Army using Assault!, two hidden votes will be placed on you at the start of the next day.
